Articles.Content:
Hello there,

today I will show you every single easteregg hidden in the depths of kerbols system in under 3 minutes. 

Have fun! 

-------------

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sXrT-j2tc3I?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

-------------

I hope you enjoyed my little video, feel free to comment on it! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

-Bluesubstance
You missed a few, Dresteriods and the second moon of duna ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). Good video thought!
You also missed the smiley face on the sea floor on Kerbin.
Yeah, I couldn't find it. ^^ Thanks for watching!
Thank you all for 500 views! I didn't think the video would reach so many views that fast! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
I think that guys trolling a bit, the 'second moon of Duna' is the magic boulder orbiting Ike, but it's been gone since around .21, love the video!
You forgot the crashed UFO on minmus.
This was really cool! I always love easter eggs in games even better when its this game .
